title: [Medicine] Association between autoimmune diseases of the nervous system and schizophrenia: A systematic review finds a significant association between autoimmune diseases of the nervous system and schizophrenia (RR = 1.42; 95%CI, 1.18â€“1.72)

[Neuroscience] A new study in Cellular Reports shows that chronic deficiency in IGF1 is associated with stunted growth and elevated signs of neurodegeneration in Down syndrome patients. These findings could pave the way for new therapies to improve quality of life for this population.
